meaningMnemonic: Older <kanji>generation</kanji>s mostly <kanji>talk</kanji> about one thing: <vocabulary>care</vocabulary>. Everybody wants to receive care once they're older, don't they?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Just remember that 世 is せ here, and not せい!
